channel.title: Encoding on KhanhIceTea B(rain)-log
channel.description: Recent content in Encoding on KhanhIceTea B(rain)-log

item.title: #TIL : Base 64 encode and decode builtin tool
item.description: Base 64 encode and decode builtin tool Browsers have helpers function to encode and decode base64 : btoa : base64 encode atob : base64 decode > btoa('Hello world') "SGVsbG8gV29ybGQgIQ==" > atob('SW4gR29kIFdlIFRydXN0ICE=') "In God We Trust !"
